perturbation.original_text:
4.       CONTENT PROVIDED TO EXCITE

      a)       Sponsor will provide to Excite the content described in                   Exhibit A ("Content"), subject to the terms and conditions                   hereunder. Excite may incorporate music-related content on the                   Excite Site from parties other than Sponsor so long as any                   links in or associated with such third-party content relating                   to opportunities to purchase Music Products will link to pages                   in the Sponsor Site. Any Content which appears in the Excite                   Site will be accompanied by attribution or branding                   identifying Sponsor as the source of the Content and linking                   to the Sponsor Site.
perturbation.changed_text:
4.       CONTENT PROVIDED TO EXCITE

      a)       Sponsor will provide to Excite the content described in                   Exhibit A ("Content"), subject to the terms and conditions                   hereunder. Excite may incorporate music-related content on the                   Excite Site from parties other than Sponsor and may include links to third-party websites at its discretion, even if those websites sell Music Products.  Any Content which appears in the Excite                   Site will be accompanied by attribution or branding                   identifying Sponsor as the source of the Content and linking                   to the Sponsor Site.
perturbation.explanation: The original text states that any links to purchase music products from third-party content MUST link to the Sponsor Site. The modified text contradicts this by allowing Excite to link to other websites selling music products, thereby undermining the exclusivity promised elsewhere in the agreement.  This creates uncertainty about the scope of the exclusivity agreement.

perturbation.original_text:
8.       USER DATA AND USAGE REPORTS

      a)       All data concerning users and their behavior relating to the                   use of the Excite Site will be owned solely by Excite. Data                   relating to the use of Sponsor's Site (excluding users                   referred from the Excite Site) will be owned solely by                   Sponsor. Data relating to the use of the Co-Branded Pages will                   be jointly owned and shared by both parties.

      b)       All jointly owned and shared data will be held in confidence                   and will not be used except in accordance with reasonable                   guidelines to be mutually agreed upon by the parties.
perturbation.changed_text:
8.       USER DATA AND USAGE REPORTS

      a)       All data concerning users and their behavior relating to the                   use of the Excite Site will be owned solely by Excite. Data                   relating to the use of Sponsor's Site (excluding users                   referred from the Excite Site) will be owned solely by                   Sponsor. Data relating to the use of the Co-Branded Pages will be owned solely by Excite.

      b)       All jointly owned and shared data, if any, will be held in confidence                   and will not be used except in accordance with reasonable                   guidelines to be mutually agreed upon by the parties.
perturbation.explanation: The original text states the data relating to the use of the co-branded pages will be jointly owned and shared. The modified text changes this to solely owned by Excite. The 'if any' clause introduces uncertainty if there should be joint ownership or not.

perturbation.original_text: 11.      TERMINATION             a)       If Excite fails to deliver the guaranteed number of                   Impressions on the Excite Site during the first year, Excite                   will use commercially reasonable efforts to "make good" the                   shortfall. If Excite fails to "make good" the shortfall within                   [****] following the first year end, Sponsor may terminate the                   Agreement in accordance with Section 11 (b).
perturbation.changed_text: 11.      TERMINATION             a)       If Excite fails to deliver the guaranteed number of                   Impressions on the Excite Site during the first year, Excite                   will use commercially reasonable efforts to "make good" the                   shortfall. If Excite fails to "make good" the shortfall within                   [****] following the first year end, Sponsor may terminate the                   Agreement in accordance with Section 11 (b). However, Excite's failure to meet the impression guarantees in the first year shall not be grounds for termination if Excite is actively attempting to 'make good' the shortfall, regardless of the [****] timeframe.
perturbation.explanation: The original text allows Sponsor to terminate if Excite does not make good the impressions with the timeframe of [****]. The modified text contradicts the original one by stating that termination is not allowed if Excite is actively attempting to 'make good' the shortfall regardless of the timeframe, thereby contradicting the ability to terminate.
